page.title: 06THE M53 MOTORWAY IN PRENTON
page.content: This motorway links Liverpool to Chester. It is also connected to the {M56}motorway at Ellesmere Port, which leads to the{M6}motorway. It caused a lot of problems to the farmland whilst it was being built. A bridge has been built over the motorway to let Storeton Hall Farm have access to its fields. The farm has{520}acres of land now.{25}acres of land was lost to the motorway. The motorway is helpful to the farmer to get his crops to market quickly. The farmer said that there had been drainage problems caused by the motorway. When the soil was put back in the fields it was poorer clay soil and it has upset the natural drainage pattern. This has made the fields wetter to work with the farm machinery.
